explanation: Multiple users discuss BTC potentially making new highs, with mentions of support at the 107,000-108,000 zone and some suggesting buying around 107,500. There is mixed sentiment with some expecting further downside due to global news and short suggestions near 110,000, but the majority of specific actionable opinions are leaning towards buying dips or regularly accumulating (e.g., buying every Friday). The overall tone is cautiously optimistic toward the uptrend as long as BTC stays above 107,300.
